DOC.brief_title: Radiation Therapy Treating Patients With Progressive Recurrent Malignant Brain Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate safety GliaSite RTS patient progressive recurrent malignant brain tumor undergoing surgical resection . II . Evaluate performance GliaSite RTS patient . OUTLINE : This open label , multicenter study . Patients undergo surgical resection tumor follow surgical placement GliaSite device resection cavity . One 2 week surgery , patient receive brachytherapy consist infusion iodine I-125 . The I-125 solution remove collect 5-7 day later . The device surgically remove within 24 hour . Patients follow 24 hour , 14 day , 1 year post device removal . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 20-40 patient accrue study .
